#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType StrokePrecisionValue.

== Name ==

*[SStrokePrecisionValue StrokePrecisionValue]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
integer
  |
  +--StrokePrecisionValue (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Element to quantify the precision and quality of a stroke.
			Must be an integer values between -2 and +2.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	inclusive lower bound: -2inclusive upper bound: 2

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CStrokePrecision StrokePrecision]
----
    <xs:simpleType name="StrokePrecisionValue">  <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">    <xs:minInclusive value="-2"/>    <xs:maxInclusive value="2"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
